long_description: The Therm-a-Rest Trail Lite(TM) Sleeping Pad offers an outstanding combination of comfort, compactness and value, making it one of the best all-around mattresses available. Die-cut foam reduces weight and bulk, making the pad light enough for backpacking, yet comfortable and durable enough for car camping. Features a new, straighter torso compared to the previous version, which increases sleep area and makes for better, gap-free mating with other rectangular pads. R-value equals 3.4; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). Therm-a-Rest Trail Lite Sleeping Pad includes a stuff sack.
